name: Federazione Confindustria Digitale
goal: Ha l’obiettivo di promuovere lo sviluppo dell’economia digitale, a beneficio della concorrenza e dell’innovazione del Paese.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Privacy
Tax Challenges Of The Digital Economy
Industry 4.0
AI
